scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend & npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: (cd lib && npm install --production=false) & (cd functions && npm install --production=false)
scripts.start: sls offline & (cd frontend && npm run dev)
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy:development: NODE_ENV=development (npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend)
scripts.deploy:production: NODE_ENV=production (npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend)
